nodes.bodyText: Question, should we also make outputLabel?
no, I don't think we're showing output label
debounce have to be defined outside the scope (ie. outside useEffect)

This is not needed. https://github.com/cdapio/cdap/blob/develop/cdap-ui/app/cdap/components/Alert/index.js#L23 We already have the logic to close the success message after 3 seconds in the Alert component
Made changes to use onClose instead of debounce
